description: The image is an educational text explaining the phrases "grave ramifications" and "exploit," highlighting their meanings and contextual applications. It defines "grave ramifications" as very serious or severe consequences, providing examples such as impacts on national security and company reputation. The term "exploit" is described with a dual connotation, showcasing its usage in a positive light as taking advantage of opportunities, illustrated with examples. This image serves as a learning resource for understanding complex vocabulary and contextual usage, ideal for enhancing reading comprehension and language proficiency. Keywords: educational resource, vocabulary learning, language context, reading comprehension, SEO content.
